title: Antarctic

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever a non-Everfrost player is visited by three or more other non-Everfrost players, the next night, they will be roleblocked.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player and a target each night. If they would visit a player who was roleblocked last night, roleblock them; otherwise, redirect them to your chosen target.
